## EntityModelNodeOverride.setLocalScaleInterpolationMs() method

Sets the interpolation time in milliseconds applied to local scale changes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setLocalScaleInterpolationMs(interpolationMs: number | undefined): void;
```

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

interpolationMs


</td><td>

number \| undefined


</td><td>

The interpolation time in milliseconds to set.

\*\*Side effects:\*\* Emits `EntityModelNodeOverrideEvent.SET_LOCAL_SCALE_INTERPOLATION_MS` when spawned.

\*\*Category:\*\* Entities


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

void
